title: Math
desc:
This quiz will test you on some basic math knowledge and test your problem-solving abilities. Good luck!

Total Questions: 3

questions.text: What is x in the equation 3x - 8 = 16?
What is the sum of the angles in a triangle?
If a rectangle has a length of 8 units and a width of 6 units, what is its area?

title: Physics
desc:
This quiz will test you on some physics fundamentals and test your problem-solving abilities. Good luck!

Total Questions: 3

questions.text: What is the SI unit of force?
When an object is in free fall, what is the acceleration due to gravity?
What does the law of conservation of energy state?
answers: Energy can only be destroyed, but never created
Energy cannot be created or destroyed, only converted from one form to another
Energy can be created or destroyed
Energy can only be created, but never destroyed
